${ModID}:UnleashedSmite.NAME: Unleashed Smite
${ModID}:UnleashedSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of cards in your hand.
${ModID}:UnleashedSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of cards in your hand. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.

${ModID}:SnowballStrike.NAME: Snowball Strike
${ModID}:SnowballStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your next turn, add !M! *Snowball *Dash to your hand.
${ModID}:SnowballStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your next turn, add !M! *Snowball *Dashes to your hand.

${ModID}:SnowballDash.NAME: Snowball Dash
${ModID}:SnowballDash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GrievousIgnite.NAME: Grievous Ignite
${ModID}:GrievousIgnite.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite for each card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:GrievousIgnite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite for each card in your hand.

${ModID}:WitheringExhaust.NAME: Withering Exhaust
${ModID}:WitheringExhaust.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL If you are holding 6 or more cards, apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak.

${ModID}:DualHeal.NAME: Dual Heal
${ModID}:DualHeal.DESCRIPTION: Heal self and enemy for !M! HP. NL Does not heal enemies that have ${ModID}:Ignite. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DeftBarrier.NAME: Deft Barrier
${ModID}:DeftBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! more card next turn.

${ModID}:PerfectClarity.NAME: Perfect Clarity
${ModID}:PerfectClarity.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Miracles into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GhostingMaelstrom.NAME: Ghosting Maelstrom
${ModID}:GhostingMaelstrom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card while you are holding 6 or more cards, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TeleportBot.NAME: Teleport Bot
${ModID}:TeleportBot.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put the bottom card of your discard pile into your hand.
${ModID}:TeleportBot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, put the bottom card of your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Flash.NAME: Flash
${ModID}:Flash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Excess draw is converted into [E] . NL Exhaust.
